original_text: “The servant who knows the master’s will and does not get ready or does not do what the master wants will be beaten with many blows.
korean_text: 주인의 뜻을 알고도 준비하지 아니하고 그 뜻대로 행하지 아니한 종은 많이 맞을 것이요

sentences.original_text: The servant who knows the master's will
or does not do what the master wants
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 주인이 원하는 것을 하지 않으면

sentences.original_text: will be beaten with many blows
